Package com.example.currencyrates

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICurrencyRatesAppManager
    Interface that will be used to control the currency rates service and list.
    IFileDownloadHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurrenciesListAdapter
    The list adapter based on the ArrayAdapter, which is used for the ListView.
    CurrenciesListAdapter.ListHeader
    A View holder class, which wraps all the list header view instances.
    CurrenciesListAdapter.ListItem
    A View holder class, which wraps all the list item view instances.
    CurrencyModel
    A model object that will hold all the necessary information that will be shown on the GUI.
    CurrencyRatesService
    The android service that will handle the Currency Rates updating from the Revolut API.
    CurrencyUtils
    Utility class that helps extracting common currency logics.
    FileUtils
    File Utilities class that helps saving image files.
    ScrollingActivity
    The main activity for this application.
